name: Word
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Result
Word
description: Word-specific information for recognized words. Currently, the only additional information provided is the the start and end time offsets. Available when using the words argument in relevant methods.

methods.name: word
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Result
Word#word
methods.description: The word corresponding to this set of information.

methods.name: start_time
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Result
Word#start_time
methods.description: Time offset relative to the beginning of the audio, and corresponding to the start of the spoken word. This field is only set if words was specified. This is an experimental feature and the accuracy of the time offset can vary.

methods.name: end_time
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Result
Word#end_time
methods.description: Time offset relative to the beginning of the audio, and corresponding to the end of the spoken word. This field is only set if words was specified. This is an experimental feature and the accuracy of the time offset can vary.
